domain.models.BasicReport module

class domain.models.BasicReport.BasicReport(algorithm_name, model, dataset_name, num_examples, num_dims, anomaly_percentage, metrics)[source]

Bases: object

Class for storing and displaying basic algorithm evaluation reports.

algorithm_name

The name of the algorithm.

Type:

str

model

The name of the model.

Type:

str

dataset_name

The name of the dataset.

Type:

str

num_examples

The number of examples in the dataset.

Type:

int

num_dims

The number of dimensions in the dataset.

Type:

int

anomaly_percentage

The percentage of anomalies in the dataset.

Type:

float

metrics

A dictionary containing evaluation metrics.

Type:

dict
